history.proof: intros n m. induction n as [|n IH]. - simpl. split. + qsimpl time: 1 use: le_refl. + hauto l: on depth: 3. - destruct (Nat.max_spec n m) as [[H1 H2] | [H1 H2]]. + qsimpl time: 1 use: le_refl. + qsimpl time: 1 use: le_refl.

original: intros n m. induction n as [|n IH]. - simpl. split. + apply Nat.le_refl. + simpl. apply Nat.le_refl. - destruct (Nat.max_spec n m) as [[H1 H2] | [H1 H2]]. + rewrite H2. split. * apply Nat.le_trans with (m := S (Nat.max n m)). ++ apply Nat.le_n_S. apply IH. ++ rewrite succ_max_distr. apply Nat.le_refl. * rewrite H2. rewrite succ_max_distr. apply Nat.le_refl. + rewrite H2. split. * apply Nat.le_n_S. apply IH. * rewrite H2. rewrite succ_max_distr. apply Nat.le_refl.
